game.name: Blocky Road Runner Game 2D
game.description:
Out of multiple free fun options available online, adventure games are one of the highly preferred ones. Today we have got you covered with a brand new adventure challenge where you have to control a little character that wants to go for long over this platform that is full of obstacles. Would you like to help him during his needy hours? Join Blocky Road Runner and be prepared to guide your hero on a completely unique track where only the brave souls can stay!

Do not forget to dodge obstacles while controlling your character over the track. Make sure to grab stars and avoid all the obstacles that you see along the way. This character is very small and cute so he does not know how to overcome the obstacles without your help. Try not to smack him into any obstacle otherwise, he will die and you will lose your game! The middle top portion of the screen will show your score, while you can track the number of stars you have earned as of now by looking at the top right corner of the screen.

Common friends! This blocky character expects a lot from your side so do not get him feel embarrassed by setting a low score. Do work hard to help him to survive for as long as possible and create your new best score in this HTML5 platform game! You can play Blocky Road Runner Game 2D online for free without download on atmegame.com. Our huge collection of free adventure games is playable on computer, smartphones, gaming consoles, tablets as well as iPhones or iPads.
